entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -23.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort McMurray Airport 06:31 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -23.6°C
Pressure: 102.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -26.1°C
Wind: SW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries beginning late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
